adminSettings.title: A valid JSON string compliant with uBO's backup format
adminSettings.description: All entries present will overwrite local settings.

advancedSettings.title: A list of [name,value] pairs to populate advanced settings

userSettings.title: A list of [name,value] pairs to populate user settings

disableDashboard.title: Set to true to prevent access to configuration options

disabledPopupPanelParts.title: An array of strings used to remove parts of the popup panel

toAdd.title: Settings to add at launch time

trustedSiteDirectives.title: A list of trusted-site directives
trustedSiteDirectives.description: Trusted-site directives to always add at launch time.

toOverwrite.title: Settings to overwrite at launch time

filters.title: A collection of filters
filters.description: The set of user filters to use at launch time -- where each entry is a distinct line.

filterLists.title: A collection of list identifiers and/or list URLs
filterLists.description: The set of filter lists to use at launch time.
